author: raulj
content: <@329594653097721856> we had this long discussion for eth2 and decided that grpc should be an implementation detail and not enshrined in the api standard. Since you can transcode grpc to json easily with a gateway, it becomes a client implementation choice and not a standard for everyone

author: raulj
content: And that ended up being a wise decision

author: raulj
content: We get to use grpc 100% while other teams can choose to do whatever suits them best, while keeping a json REST standard
